about_the_game:
Ballad of Angels is a 2D top-down online pvp arena battler, where you against a group of others, collect power-ups, items, and gear, in order to get prepared for the final match, a perma-death free for all.

During the game you will go through two modes per match. In the first mode (Resource mode), you along with everyone else who can attack you, will be spending this time to build out your character. Collect power-ups in order to focus your character into a specific combat style build: Melee, Range, and or Magic. You can also find items and gear throughout this mode to use and equip in order to gain an advantage. After some time the resource mode will end and everyone will move onto the final mode: Fighting mode. This is where you will put your character build to the test fighting against anyone and everyone and try to be the last player alive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 400
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: Collect power-ups, items, and gear to survive against others in this 2D top-down online pvp arena battler. Hone your skills and learn the tech involved with three combat styles, dashing, jumping, blocking, redirecting, and abilities. Collect power-ups to determine your unique build for the game.
